tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE TrafficFlowData (
   project_id INT,
   project_name VARCHAR(255),
   project_location VARCHAR(255),
   traffic_volume INT,
   average_speed REAL
)

CREATE TABLE TrafficFlowData (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  project_name VARCHAR(255),
  date_time TIMESTAMP,
  vehicle_type VARCHAR(50),
  speed INT,
  location VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE TrafficIncidents (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  incident_type VARCHAR(50),
  location VARCHAR(100),
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE TrafficAnalysis (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  project_id INT,
  date_time TIMESTAMP,
  average_speed INT,
  traffic_volume INT
);

CREATE TABLE traffic_flow_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  project_id INT,
  vehicle_type VARCHAR,
  speed INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE project_details (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  project_name VARCHAR,
  project_location VARCHAR,
  start_date DATE,
  completion_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE road_network (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  road_name VARCHAR,
  road_type VARCHAR,
  length FLOAT,
  construction_year INT
)

CREATE TABLE sensor_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sensor_id INT,
  road_id INT,
  vehicle_count INT,
  sensor_status VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE traffic_sensor_data (
  sensor_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR(100),
  traffic_volume INT,
  vehicle_type VARCHAR(50),
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE traffic_incidents (
  incident_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR(100),
  incident_type VARCHAR(50),
  description TEXT,
  reported_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE road_network (
  road_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  road_name VARCHAR(100),
  length_miles DECIMAL(10,2),
  surface_type VARCHAR(50),
  construction_year INT
)

CREATE TABLE traffic_camera_feed (
  camera_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR(100),
  camera_angle VARCHAR(50),
  status VARCHAR(50),
  last_updated TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE traffic_analysis_results (
  analysis_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  road_id UUID,
  analysis_type VARCHAR(50),
  result TEXT,
  analyzed_at TIMESTAMP
)
